name: Awakalipsis
description:
The avocados have gone bad and you are the only hope humanity has to make a good guacamole. Gather all the ingredients scattered throughout the kitchen, and end up in the molcajete to fulfill your destiny. Just be careful! There are other avocados that have gone bad who will want to bring you with them to their rotten end.  

This game was submitted for the Future Game Developer's Jam 10 hosted by UNIAT (University of Advanced Technologies).

Music made by purple-planet.com

This game was made by:

  • Alain Barragán
  • Moisés López
  • Luis Alberto Valera
  • César Ramírez
  • @luisquid

There is an easter egg in the picture that means a lot to us. Make sure to try and find it out! :D
